participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: A creative and adventurous individual who enjoys exploring new ideas and concepts.
participant_1.background: I'm a swim coach at my local pool. My family and I are from India. I'm studying to be a computer programmer. My mother is very traditional while I prefer to be more free spirited.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: A playful and imaginative child with a curious mind and a love for fun activities.
participant_2.background: When I grow up, I want to be a dog. I like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. I like to look at blocks and sing about letters. I like to eat chocolate candy. I'm four years old.

content.text: Hello! I am four years old, how old are you?
I am 22 and i am a programmer
It was a fun experience. I work as a computer programmer.
And I like to look at blocks
I read a lot, especially since i have time‚è∞ to go out.
What else do you like to do?
I like to play sports and bake.
Oh, I like sweets! Can you do some for me?
Sure. I am a sucker for some free time‚è∞.
I am not. I am a computer geek but i am a computer science.
